Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Trust you are doing great!
Please note that we are offering a series of Online Training courses delivered by Subject Matter Experts live on GlobalMeet Audio Conferencing. These courses are only 30mins and you can select the dates to suit your availability. This course is aimed at providing you with information needed to host effective GlobalMeet Audio meetings. The schedule for GlobalMeet Audio Training is on every Wednesdays at 3:30pm IST or 10am GMT.
You can register yourself by sending the following details to diganta.dekka@pgi.com.
Name Email Address Phone/Mobile Training Date
Post receiving the details from your side , we would send out an invite to you. This Training session would be very informative and includes interactive Q&A sessions at the end of it. If you have any doubts or queries , please drop an email to diganta.dekka@pgi.com or call +91 7760963123.
Regards,
PGi Training Team
